site_name: St. Saviours C Of E Infant School
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Notwithstanding the information shown on the submitted drawings, the replacement railings shall match the design of the existing original railings, using railhead reference 13.35 in Bundle Catalogue and Railhead 05H709.  REASON:  To ensure that the railings match the design of the original to protect and enhance the setting of the locally listed building and the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.
description: Raising brick piers, replacement of pier caps and replacement railings to boundary with The Grove
